title: Flat stone

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Flat stone is located in the lake north of the Mountain Camp. It is used in the Mountain Daughter quest to reach the island and the center of the lake. The player must use a plank on the flat stone to place it down and walk across, as attempting to jump-across will result in the player falling into the lake and swimming back to shore.

content:
Flat stone
Released7 March 2005 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestMountain Daughter
LocationLake north of Mountain Camp
OptionsJump-across
ExamineSomething put on top of this wouldn't fall off, it's quite smooth and flat.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID5850

The Flat stone is located in the lake north of the Mountain Camp. It is used in the Mountain Daughter quest to reach the island and the center of the lake. The player must use a plank on the flat stone to place it down and walk across, as attempting to jump-across will result in the player falling into the lake and swimming back to shore.

After the quest, the flat stone cannot be reached, because the tree leading to the first island in the lake can no longer be climbed.

The '''Flat stone''' is located in the lake north of the [[Mountain Camp]]. It is used in the [[Mountain Daughter]] quest to reach the island and the center of the lake. The player must use a [[plank]] on the flat stone to place it down and walk across, as attempting to jump-across will result in the player falling into the lake and swimming back to shore.

After the quest, the flat stone cannot be reached, because the tree leading to the first island in the lake can no longer be climbed.
